‚è±Ô∏è 25 min | Advanced

Viewport Meta Tag

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

Media Queries

/* Mobile first */
p { font-size: 14px; }

/* Tablets and up */
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  p { font-size: 16px; }
}

/* Desktop and up */
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  p { font-size: 18px; }
}

Fluid Design

div { width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; }
img { width: 100%; height: auto; }
